amendment.description: Amendment sought to broaden the definition of a vulnerable person to include residents in any neighborhood in which the incidence of violent crime is above the national average.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include as a definition of "vulnerable crime victim," any person who resides in a neighborhood in which the incidence of violent crime is above the national average.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
